name: Discombobulated Gravity
description:
Discombobulated Gravity is a puzzle game where you play as a little robot which must get a small energy orb into each level's energy catcher. The problem? Gravity is completely out of control and doesn't want you to complete your only robotic task, will you prove it wrong?

- This in an entry into the GMTK 2020 Game Jam -

WARNING: This game can be disorientating and could possibly cause motion sickness if you are easily effected by quick changes in angle of view.
